channel.title: Adding some other silab items to server
channel.description: i have a god sword, barrelchest anchor, d boots, and things like that. But I dont have things like Bandos armor, 3rd age range and mage stuff, and armydl stuff. How do I add onto the server? And how do I change where I can pickup 5 number items?

item.title: Adding some other silab items to server
item.dc:creator: @adamator5 adamator5
item.description:
@adamator5 wrote:

Dragon Full Helm = 15195

item.title: Adding some other silab items to server
item.dc:creator: @rocketscience rocketscience
item.description:
@rocketscience wrote:

well were you change to 5 digit numerals is in the command pickup

go to client .java and search for pickup. You should eventually find this

		} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Marios")) {
			try {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
				if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}

well after that, in the substring that says 12 (in code) change too 13. And there you have it

I hope this helped

Read full topic
